template.name: apache_content_template
template.summary: Create a set of derived types for apache web content.

param.name: prefix
param.summary: The prefix to be used for deriving type names.

template.name: apache_per_role_template
template.summary: The per role template for the apache module.

desc.p: This template creates types used for web pages and web cgi to be used from the user home directory.
This template is invoked automatically for each user, and generally does not need to be invoked directly by policy writers.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

param.name: user_domain
param.summary: The type of the user domain.

param.name: user_role
param.summary: The role associated with the user domain.

param.name: domain_prefix
param.summary: Prefix of the domain. Example, user would be the prefix for the uder_t domain.

param.name: domain_prefix
param.summary: Prefix of the domain. Example, user would be the prefix for the uder_t domain.

interface.name: apache_domtrans
interface.summary: Transition to apache.

interface.name: apache_signull
interface.summary: Send a null signal to apache.

interface.name: apache_sigchld
interface.summary: Send a SIGCHLD signal to apache.

interface.name: apache_use_fds
interface.summary: Inherit and use file descriptors from Apache.

interface.name: apache_dontaudit_rw_stream_sockets
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read and write Apache unix domain stream sockets.

interface.name: apache_dontaudit_rw_tcp_sockets
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read and write Apache TCP sockets.

interface.name: apache_manage_all_content
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete all web content.

interface.name: apache_rw_cache_files
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to read and write Apache cache files.

interface.name: apache_read_config
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to read apache configuration files.

interface.name: apache_manage_config
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to manage apache configuration files.

interface.name: apache_domtrans_helper
interface.summary: Execute the Apache helper program with a domain transition.

interface.name: apache_run_helper
interface.summary: Execute the Apache helper program with a domain transition, and allow the specified role the dmidecode domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the dmidecode domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the dmidecode domain to use.

interface.name: apache_read_log
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to read apache log files.

interface.name: apache_append_log
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to append to apache log files.

interface.name: apache_dontaudit_append_log
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to append to the Apache logs.

interface.name: apache_manage_log
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to manage to apache log files.

interface.name: apache_dontaudit_search_modules
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to search Apache module directories.

interface.name: apache_list_modules
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to list the contents of the apache modules directory.

interface.name: apache_exec_modules
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to execute apache modules.

interface.name: apache_domtrans_rotatelogs
interface.summary: Execute a domain transition to run httpd_rotatelogs.

interface.name: apache_manage_sys_content
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to manage apache system content files.

interface.name: apache_domtrans_sys_script
interface.summary: Execute all web scripts in the system script domain.

interface.name: apache_dontaudit_rw_sys_script_stream_sockets
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read and write Apache system script unix domain stream sockets.

interface.name: apache_domtrans_all_scripts
interface.summary: Execute all user scripts in the user script domain.

interface.name: apache_run_all_scripts
interface.summary: Execute all user scripts in the user script domain. Add user script domains to the specified role.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the script domains.

interface.name: apache_read_squirrelmail_data
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to read apache squirrelmail data.

interface.name: apache_append_squirrelmail_data
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to append apache squirrelmail data.

interface.name: apache_search_sys_content
interface.summary: Search apache system content.

interface.name: apache_read_sys_content
interface.summary: Read apache system content.

interface.name: apache_search_sys_script_state
interface.summary: Search system script state directory.

desc.p: Allow Apache to modify public files used for public file transfer services.
Allow httpd to use built in scripting (usually php)
Allow http daemon to tcp connect
Allow httpd to connect to mysql/posgresql
Allow httpd to act as a relay
Allow httpd to act as a FTP server by listening on the ftp port.
Allow httpd to read home directories
Run SSI execs in system CGI script domain.
Allow http daemon to communicate with the TTY
Run CGI in the main httpd domain
